statements: UPDATE QuantumCommunicationData SET message = 'New message 1' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE QuantumCommunicationData SET encryption_key = 'new_key', timestamp = NOW() WHERE data_id = 1;
UPDATE CustomerData SET encrypted_address = 'new_address', quantum_data_id = 2 WHERE customer_id = 3;
